Description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Sales Manager to join our dynamic team at Blugrass Technologies. As a sales Manager, you will be responsible for leading and managing our sales team, developing strategic sales plans, and achieving sales targets. You will play a crucial role in driving revenue growth, building strong customer relationships, and expanding our market presence in Dubai and the surrounding regions.Responsibilities:Leadership and Team Management:Build, lead, and motivate a high-performing sales team.
Provide coaching, guidance, and training to enhance team performance.
Set clear sales targets, monitor progress, and provide regular performance feedback.
Foster a collaborative and results-oriented work environment.Strategic Sales Planning:Develop and implement comprehensive sales strategies to drive revenue growth and achieve company objectives.
Identify new market opportunities, emerging trends, and potential clients.
Conduct market research to analyze competitors, pricing strategies, and customer preferences.
Define sales targets, budgets, and resource allocation plans.Business Development:Establish and nurture strong relationships with key clients, partners, and stakeholders.
Identify and pursue new business opportunities through effective lead generation and prospecting activities.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop customized solutions and proposals that address client needs.
Participate in networking events, conferences, and industry exhibitions to promote company products and services.Sales Performance and Reporting:Track, analyze, and report on sales metrics and key performance indicators.
Monitor market trends, customer feedback, and competitor activities to recommend appropriate strategies.
Prepare accurate sales forecasts, budgets, and reports for senior management.
Identify areas of improvement and implement corrective actions to optimize sales effectiveness.Customer Relationship Management:Cultivate strong relationships with existing clients to ensure customer satisfaction and maximize upselling and cross-selling opportunities.
Collaborate with the customer support team to address client inquiries, concerns, and escalations promptly.
Act as a trusted advisor to clients, providing insights and recommendations on technology solutions.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Marketing, or a related field (master’s degree preferred).
Proven experience as a sales Manager or in a similar role for 5+ years in the IT industry.
Strong record of accomplishment of achieving and exceeding sales targets. YOY revenue and target achieving proof is required.
Prior experience of dealing with government entities as customers is a plus.
In-depth knowledge of sales techniques, market dynamics, and customer relationship management.
Excellent leadership and team management skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate others.
Exceptional communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
Analytical mindset, with the ability to interpret sales data and make data-driven decisions.
Self-motivated, result-oriented, and capable of working independently or as part of a team.
Familiarity with CRM software and sales management tools.
Bilingual/ Arabic and English is a must.
